description: We have had a few colder days so made this healthy, tasty and easy soup. A great family dinner. An old favourite from my beautiful grandma.
keywords: Ham Hock And Vegetable Lentil Soup
name: Ham Hock And Vegetable Lentil Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off slow cooker and take out ham hock. Place on a chopping board and take off all meat and put back into soup. Discard the fatty bits. Enjoy!
